A practice question bank feature allowing users to browse and select individual questions
Simulated exam functionality enabling users to take full practice tests
Error analysis dashboard displaying detailed feedback on incorrect answers
Exam scoring system showing results and performance metrics after each test
User interface with floral white background and dark goldenrod colored components
Frontend application that fetches all practice questions and exam data from backend APIs
Backend server connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Database schema supporting storage of questions, user responses, and exam results
Question selection interface allowing users to choose topics or randomize practice questions
Timer functionality for simulated exams to mimic real testing conditions
Score history tracking to allow users to review past exam performances
Answer explanation display for both correct and incorrect responses
Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
User session management to track progress and maintain state during exams
Package.json configuration enabling concurrent frontend and backend development startup
